str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hide, conceal, lay up. A primary verb; to conceal.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
